title: HUAMULAN 15 PCS Cabinet Knobs Glossy Ceramic Dresser Mushroom Table Drawer Rustic Cupboard Pull Furniture DIY Wardrobe Solid Color Vintage Handle,with 3 Size Mounting Screws
description: The Knobs Feel Smooth And Look Magnificent Fantastic. They Perfectly Work In Decoration Furniture Such as Kitchen Cabinets, Drawers, Cupboards, Coffee Tables, Bathroom,Bedroom Dresser, Dressing Table, Antique Buffet, Halloween Project, Antique Projects, Fall, etc.  They Look Vintage and Create a Beautiful New Look, also a Lovely and Traditional Look to Older Looking Furniture! They Are Just the Touch Needed to "Dress Up" Your Room! Material: Ceramic and Alloy  Diameter: 34mm(1.3 inch)  Knob Height: 3.2mm(1.26 inch)  3 Sized Screws Provided:M4*20mm,M4*22mm,M4*25mm
